name: protosynthesis
effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
short_effect: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
